title: Comfy and Cozy 1 Bedroom, Pool View, Easy Access to Grills !!!!
posting_body: ['Spectrum Apartments', '9242 W. Russell Rd.', '#102 , Las Vegas, NV, 89148', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'WELCOME TO SPECTRUM APARTMENTS', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 724 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Enjoy quality living at Spectrum Apartment Homes.', 'Located in west Las Vegas, NV, near Spring Valley.', 'Spectrum is ideal for those seeking the ultimate in comfort and convenience.', 'Living at Spectrum means everything that you need and love is close at hand.', 'Our central location puts you just minutes away from local schools, fine dining, entertainment attractions and fabulous shopping.', 'Our one, two and two bedroom town home floor plans were thoughtfully designed with your comfort and convenience in mind.', 'All of our apartment home rentals are appointed with a wide array of highly desirable amenities including air conditioning, spacious walk-in closets, a well-equipped kitchen, ceiling fans, intrusion alarms and more!', 'Our thoroughly pampered residents live a life of luxury here at Spectrum Apartment Homes.', 'Relax by our resort-style pool, enjoy a nice work out in our state-of-the-art fitness center, or entertain family and friends in the lavish clubhouse.', 'Whatever your lifestyle may be, here at Spectrum Apartment Homes there is something for everyone!', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the rent', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', '10wcurg3P']
